<<code language="ocaml" | sig
  type 'a t = 'a
  val return : 'a -> 'a t
  type ('a, 'b) ft = 'a -> 'b
  val fmap : ('a, 'b) ft -> 'a t -> 'b t
  type 'a tlist = 'a list
  val nil : unit -> 'a tlist
  val singleton : 'a t -> 'a tlist
  val cons : 'a t -> 'a tlist -> 'a tlist
  val append : 'a tlist -> 'a tlist -> 'a tlist
  val map : ('a, 'b) ft -> 'a tlist -> 'b tlist
end >>
